text:
What will I do to wear bangles on Eid? 
When the one who has to listen to the sound of them is sitting far away. :(
#choriya #EidUlFitr https://t.co/sy7tJ5Zqi0

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
I wish life passed as fast as Ramadan goes. :)
#Ramadan #life

author: Sehar Yusuf
text: HB to u, my sweet sis. “I wish I could celebrate with u today. You're the best! On ur special day, I wish u only ☺n joy. May each minute of ur life be filled with happiness n may this BD be just perfect 4 u! My wonderful sis,u r the only 1 in this entire world. @iamhelly4 ❤🎂✨ https://t.co/chDLGOBrGk

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
No one can take his life by holding his breath himself.🥀
Then how can you expect me, to stop asking for you from Allah?
#notbrave #Dua #hopefull

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
Allhumdulila, Today I completed the reading of the Quran Pak. 😇❤
#Ramadan #lastfriday #Quran

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
what is the benefit of expressing so-called solidarity without doing practically something? we just talk and can't do anything more than that. @ImranKhanPTI 
#Palestine #MasjidAlAqsa #Pakistan #MuslimLivesMatter https://t.co/5L2voRByuu

text:

27th Roza last Friday of Ramadan.
@SamiYusuf 😌❤
#samiyusuf #Ramadan #lastfridayoframadan #the99names https://t.co/XAQLCNMrMh

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
'Beyond the stars' 
The name of this concert is perfect for it. While listening to this treasure feels like I'm there in this spiritual environment. Honestly, I don't have words to express my feelings. @SamiYusuf ❣✨
#samiyusuf #beyondthestars #music #spiritique https://t.co/gxZuAm8aD9

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
I needed to read this. 
@muftimenk Thank you 😇❤ https://t.co/2avtgSmbGC

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
My eyes are filled with tears, 
I'm hiding the tears with blinks. 
Don't want to allow them to come out. 
I'm hiding them but from whom? 
No one is around me it's dark. Maybe I hiding them from myself. 
#tears #Ramadan

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
Why we are so judgmental?
Even we judge the tears. :| https://t.co/gTYfyrihxY

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
The time is passing so fast 
And I'm still standing there for years.
#fullmoon #Ramadan https://t.co/Zz67jIkc2v

author: Sehar Yusuf
Sehar Yusuf
text:
Beloved, 
I'm waiting,
For You to remember me. ❣⏳
@SamiYusuf ❤
#samiyusuf #music #callmyname #spiritique https://t.co/E3E0zwBQOv

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
I'm in need of You
But You have no need of me.
@SamiYusuf ❣
#SamiYusuf #music #spiritique https://t.co/sFn8O0KKca

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
I think I'm gonna die soon. :D 
#vomiting #sick

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
My health became so unwell, that I broke the fast. 
There's no peace left inside me. physically, mentally, and emotionally.
Please pray for me if you can. I request you.
@SamiYusuf 
#Ramadan

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
Dear @SamiYusuf ❤ Thank you very much for creating this treasure for us. This beautiful playlist started with my favorite gem 'The Wine of Love'. I really love it. Lots of love and prayers ❤🤲🏻🇵🇰
#SamiYusuf #Ramadan https://t.co/YfRFIpUd8G

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
Today two years are completed. I feel many things changed and nothing changed at all. I'm still there or I went far away. I gained many things or nothing. Two years passed or maybe I'm still there from where I started. :|
25 April 2020 to 2 April 2022
#Ramadan

author: Sehar Yusuf
text: Dear @SamiYusuf Rmdn is my fvrt month Mslis too. Rmdn gives me hope that I can be forgiven n InSha'Allah Allah will ans my dua. I lve the spirituality that is in the air during Rmdn. Rmdn mks us more cls to Allah It strengthens our bond n the beginning of so mny gd thngs. RM!🤲🏼🇵🇰 https://t.co/UhOGOE8DM0

author: Sehar Yusuf
text: Oh, my dear nights I love u more than days. U gave shelter to me to lighten my heart. U gave me a place to cry so no one can see my wet pillow, U gave me darkness so no one can see my swollen eyes. U gave me time to talk to my creator. Oh, my dear nights I love U more than days😭

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
Beloved @SamiYusuf ❤ always your music affects me very much. Lots of love and prayers for you.   🇵🇰🤲🏼

author: Sehar Yusuf
text: Mawlana Rumi's poetry always lifts the fire inside you but the way you composed it makes the poetry more touching. With every second feels like I'm stepping to the next level, experiencing another world's life. @SamiYusuf ❤️🤲🏼🇵🇰 https://t.co/EPzHmAnXxx

text:

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
We cry all day without tears, but when no one is around us our eyes fill with water in a nanosecond.
#BROKEN #hurt

author: Sehar Yusuf
text: It feels like night after night, darker, quieter, and more restless, with no hope for the day, no more light, no cure, no life. :'|

text:

Not to the childhood but this treasure reminds me of the time when I started growing and everything changes. https://t.co/mM979p6KFW

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
Today is my final exam why I'm so disturbed. I want to focus. :|
#examday #makeupartist

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
Why I'm so helpless I can't cry, can't shout, can't even live. I'm tired of this helplessness. I'm tired, I'm tired. 😣
#silence #helplessness

author: Sehar Yusuf
text: Absolutely amazing, keep up the great work, we are proud of you and all your accomplishments. @SamiYusuf ❤😊🇵🇰 https://t.co/zKkvmzdjjA

author: Sehar Yusuf
text: Thanks to u beloved for showing the world this timeless treasure. Coz of u, I came to know traditional music let me say u are the reason, that I realize the value of traditions n culture, We learn a lot from u & continue learning. Huge respect n love for u. @SamiYusuf ❤️🙏🇵🇰 https://t.co/zKkvmzdjjA

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
I'm tired I want a decision now. 
😶💔

author: Sehar Yusuf
text:
Doesn't matter whatever I do I have to study. I run from study but seems like study run behind me. 😈🏃‍♂️
Ugh, Ugh, Ugh 😩
Anyhow, tomorrow is the final exam I need your prayers friends. ❣
#Exams #makeupartist https://t.co/4nzNsZgt48
